{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":123451,"originalJapaneseLine":"　温泉を二人じめなんてしないのだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"I won’t hog the hot spring all to myself!"},{"lineNumber":123452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛ちゃんとだけお風呂入っても楽しいんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's fun to take a bath with Ai-chan alone."},{"lineNumber":123453,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう一人増えたらもっと楽しいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But adding one more person makes it even more fun."},{"lineNumber":123454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"……"},{"lineNumber":123455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ、そこまで喜ばれたら","translatedEnglishLine":"Hah, when you’re that happy about it,"},{"lineNumber":123456,"originalJapaneseLine":"　怒る気も失せるわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t even feel like getting angry anymore…"},{"lineNumber":123457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh..."},{"lineNumber":123458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、温泉といえば背中を流しっこをするものだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, when it comes to hot springs, you have to wash each other's backs."},{"lineNumber":123459,"originalJapaneseLine":"　愛ちゃん、洗い場に行くぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ai-chan, let’s go to the washing area."},{"lineNumber":123460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、つるーんと手が滑って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, my hand slips smoothly and..."},{"lineNumber":123461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「触れないで下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please don’t touch me."},{"lineNumber":123462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいてっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ouch!"},{"lineNumber":123463,"originalJapaneseLine":"愛とゆっくりと温泉に浸かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"I slowly soaked in the hot spring with Ai."},{"lineNumber":123464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「虎子には負けません！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won’t lose to Torako!"},{"lineNumber":123465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、勝子、お手伝いか、偉いぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, Katsuko, helping out? That’s admirable."},{"lineNumber":123466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんだか引っかかる言い方ですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"...That sounds a bit suspicious."},{"lineNumber":123467,"originalJapaneseLine":"廊下の前から大量の書類を抱えた勝子が現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katsuko appeared at the hallway carrying a large pile of documents."},{"lineNumber":123468,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛ちゃんの手伝いか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Helping Ai-chan?"},{"lineNumber":123469,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大変そうだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Looks tough."},{"lineNumber":123470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、上杉家を継ごうというんです、","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I’m trying to take over the Uesugi family,"},{"lineNumber":123471,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少しでも仕事を覚えないと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So I have to learn even a little bit of the work..."},{"lineNumber":123472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「休んでいる暇はありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s no time to rest."},{"lineNumber":123473,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh—"},{"lineNumber":123474,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":123475,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜なでなで、ぽんぽん＞","translatedEnglishLine":" <Pat-pat on the head>"},{"lineNumber":123476,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ！？　何するんですか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Eek!? What are you doing!?"},{"lineNumber":123477,"originalJapaneseLine":"書類を抱えたまま、ズザザッと勝子が離れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Still carrying the documents, Katsuko slid away hurriedly."},{"lineNumber":123478,"originalJapaneseLine":"「頑張っているようだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"You seemed to be working hard,"},{"lineNumber":123479,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頭を撫でてやっただけだろうが。","translatedEnglishLine":"so I just patted your head. What’s with the surprise?"},{"lineNumber":123480,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何を驚いてんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":123481,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、突然そんなことされたら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you suddenly do something like that,"},{"lineNumber":123482,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰だって驚きます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"anyone would be surprised!"},{"lineNumber":123483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"……"},{"lineNumber":123484,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、千姫さん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, Chihime-san."},{"lineNumber":123485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"……"},{"lineNumber":123486,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":123487,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜なでなで、ぽんぽん＞","translatedEnglishLine":" <Pat-pat on the head>"},{"lineNumber":123488,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":123489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆のお手伝いがしたい年頃なんだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s that age when you want to help everyone out."},{"lineNumber":123490,"originalJapaneseLine":"　偉い偉い」","translatedEnglishLine":"Good, good."},{"lineNumber":123491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たまごポーロをあげよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll give you some tamago poro (egg cookies)."},{"lineNumber":123492,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-yeah..."},{"lineNumber":123493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ではな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then."},{"lineNumber":123494,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Um..."},{"lineNumber":123495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm?"},{"lineNumber":123496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしかして私、みんなに","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be that everyone is"},{"lineNumber":123497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　子供扱いされてません？」","translatedEnglishLine":"treating me like a child?"},{"lineNumber":123498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、半分子供みたいなもんだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, you’re kind of like a half-child anyway."},{"lineNumber":123499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「違います！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s not true!"},{"lineNumber":123500,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう、虎子、あんた書類どこに落としたのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Good grief, Torako, where did you drop the documents?"},{"lineNumber":123501,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝子と虎子が書類運びをしている間に、","translatedEnglishLine":"While Katsuko and Torako were carrying the documents,"},{"lineNumber":123502,"originalJapaneseLine":"行方不明になった書類を捜していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"I was searching for the missing documents."},{"lineNumber":123503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう……ぐす、知らない……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh… snif, I don’t know…"},

{"lineNumber":123504,"originalJapaneseLine":"　知らないもん……","translatedEnglishLine":"I really don’t know…"},

{"lineNumber":123505,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……虎子に手伝ってもらおうと思ったのが","translatedEnglishLine":"Sigh… Thinking it would be a good idea to get Torako’s help,"},

{"lineNumber":123506,"originalJapaneseLine":"　間違いだったのかしら","translatedEnglishLine":"maybe it was a mistake."},

{"lineNumber":123507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーん！　勝子が嫌味ったらしいよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Waaah! Katsuko is being sarcastic!"},

{"lineNumber":123508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう、ピーピー泣いてないで捜してよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, stop crying and look for it..."},

{"lineNumber":123509,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ね、ねえ、ねえねえ、勝子……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, hey, hey hey, Katsuko..."},

{"lineNumber":123510,"originalJapaneseLine":"虎子が勝子にすがりつく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Torako clung to Katsuko."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 温泉を二人じめなんてしないのだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t hog the hot spring all to myself!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「愛ちゃんとだけお風呂入っても楽しいんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's fun to take a bath with Ai-chan alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう一人増えたらもっと楽しいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But adding one more person makes it even more fun.
Hah, when you’re that happy about it,
I don’t even feel like getting angry anymore…

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、温泉といえば背中を流しっこをするものだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, when it comes to hot springs, you have to wash each other's backs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛ちゃん、洗い場に行くぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai-chan, let’s go to the washing area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、つるーんと手が滑って……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, my hand slips smoothly and...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛とゆっくりと温泉に浸かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I slowly soaked in the hot spring with Ai.
Oh, Katsuko, helping out? That’s admirable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんだか引っかかる言い方ですね」
廊下の前から大量の書類を抱えた勝子が現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katsuko appeared at the hallway carrying a large pile of documents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、上杉家を継ごうというんです、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I’m trying to take over the Uesugi family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しでも仕事を覚えないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I have to learn even a little bit of the work...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「休んでいる暇はありません」
「きゃっ！？　何するんですか！？」
書類を抱えたまま、ズザザッと勝子が離れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still carrying the documents, Katsuko slid away hurriedly.
You seemed to be working hard,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭を撫でてやっただけだろうが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I just patted your head. What’s with the surprise?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、突然そんなことされたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you suddenly do something like that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆のお手伝いがしたい年頃なんだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s that age when you want to help everyone out.
I’ll give you some tamago poro (egg cookies).
Could it be that everyone is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供扱いされてません？」
「まあ、半分子供みたいなもんだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, you’re kind of like a half-child anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、虎子、あんた書類どこに落としたのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good grief, Torako, where did you drop the documents?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝子と虎子が書類運びをしている間に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Katsuko and Torako were carrying the documents,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行方不明になった書類を捜していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was searching for the missing documents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……虎子に手伝ってもらおうと思ったのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sigh… Thinking it would be a good idea to get Torako’s help,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違いだったのかしら
「うわーん！　勝子が嫌味ったらしいよー！」
「もう、ピーピー泣いてないで捜してよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, stop crying and look for it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 虎子が勝子にすがりつく。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Oh, Katsuko, helping out? That’s admirable.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katsuko appeared at the hallway carrying a large pile of documents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、上杉家を継ごうというんです、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I’m trying to take over the Uesugi family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しでも仕事を覚えないと……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still carrying the documents, Katsuko slid away hurriedly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、突然そんなことされたら、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s that age when you want to help everyone out.
I’ll give you some tamago poro (egg cookies).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子供扱いされてません？」
「まあ、半分子供みたいなもんだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, you’re kind of like a half-child anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、虎子、あんた書類どこに落としたのよ」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝子と虎子が書類運びをしている間に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Katsuko and Torako were carrying the documents,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was searching for the missing documents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……虎子に手伝ってもらおうと思ったのが

「うわーん！　勝子が嫌味ったらしいよー！」
「もう、ピーピー泣いてないで捜してよ……
